mapper.select: select * from ( select '0' colorId, '红色【I级】' name, '0' count from dual union all select '1' colorId,'橙色【II级】' name, '0' count from dual union all select '2' colorId,'黄色【III级】' name, '0' count from dual union all select '3' colorId,'蓝色【IV级】' name, '0' count from dual )f where 1=1
select id, name ,0 count from channel where area_id=#{empAreaId}
select * from channel where type=0 and area_id =#{empAreaId}
select id, code, area_name areaName, level,p_id pid, (select area_name from area where id = t.p_id) parentAreaName from area t where FIND_IN_SET(t.id, getAreaCList(#{empAreaId}))

select id, code, name, type ,p_id pid, is_config config, case disaster_color when 0 then '红色' when 1 then '橙色' when 2 then '黄色' else '蓝色' end colorLevelName, (select name from disaster where id = t.p_id ) parentName from disaster t
